title: stakebot
author: stakebot
content: Hello. I have created a wagering API bot for almost all original steak games. Its functionality is much higher than that of all available bots that you will find on the Internet. I will say right away that I am not going to distribute it in large copies. It won't be cheap. I'm looking for a person who actually makes money for a steak through turnover and wants to automate his game. if you are interested, write to me
